text: While I was with them 17:12 in the world ¦ --- CTin the world, I kept them in yoʋr 17:12 name. I have guarded those yoʋ have given me, ¦ name, which yoʋ have given me. I have guarded them, CTname. I have guarded those yoʋ have given me, and not one of them has perished except the son of destruction, so that the Scripture might be fulfilled.
